**課程簡介**

本課程將介紹教育心理學的基礎理論，及其在實際課堂教學時的應用。從人類的發展理論開始，讓學生瞭解兒童到青少年期的發展過程和學生間的差異對學習的影響。再以行為主義、認知心理學以及建構主義的角度出發，來檢視何謂有效的教學法或課程。選修本課程的同學除了要瞭解教育心理學的原理之外，也要培養批判性和創新思考的能力，思索如何將教育心理學的理論有效實際應用到教學中。

This course introduces theories of educational psychology and their possible applications in teaching and classroom activities. Starting from the theories about child development, students will learn about the developmental processes of children and adolescents, how individual differences between students affect learning, and judging the effectiveness of teaching methods or lessons from the perspective of behaviorism, cognitive psychology, and constructivism/constructionism. 

Participants of this course should not only understand the basic theories of educational psychology, but also are required to develop their abilities in critical and creative thinking, so that they can thoughtfully apply the theories into practical teaching.
